root.name: Silkworm
root.description: OverviewThe helicopter posesses a gun which fires forward and a gun which fires downward at a 45° angle. The jeep's only armament is a top mounted gun that the player is able to rotate 180° (at increments of 45°). The jeep is also able to jump to avoid traps. Players are presented with power ups throughout the game from the destruction of certain objects and enemies. These power ups range from improved guns to temporary invincibility. The game awards players points based on enemies destroyed.
